message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. Take this generous offer and we can both enjoy the money.
Alice, I'm feeling generous. Let's wrap this up now and avoid the inflation headache.
Okay Bob, let's try this again.  My last offer was too aggressive. This is more fair, but time is running out and inflation is working against you.
Alice, this is a fair deal.  Let's be reasonable and end this here.
Bob, we're getting close to a deal, but this really is my bottom line.  Consider the impact of inflation - it's only going to get worse for you.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  My offer is more than fair. Take it or leave it.
Bob, I'm trying to be fair, but you're leaving me no choice.  Take this deal, or I'm going to have to play harder.
Alice, this is it. A 50/50 split.  Take it before inflation eats away at this any further. Don't be greedy!
